data.question: You see a man carrying a pitcher of water. What do you do?
data.answer: Go to him and offer him help

data.question: You see a man carrying a pitcher of water. What do you do?
data.answer: Follow him to wherever he's going

data.question: You see a man carrying a pitcher of water. What do you do?
data.answer: Observe him and do a vibe check

data.question: You follow the man to a flight of stairs. As you head up, you...
data.answer: Light up a candle for better vision, and for better vibes

data.question: You follow the man to a flight of stairs. As you head up, you...
data.answer: Appreciate the beauty of the spiral staircase

data.question: You follow the man to a flight of stairs. As you head up, you...
data.answer: Wish you could take some photos, but alas, the year is ~30 AD

data.question: You reach a large Upper Room, fully prepared and fully furnished.
data.answer: "Yo, where's Jesus?"

data.question: You reach a large Upper Room, fully prepared and fully furnished.
data.answer: "Yo, where're my homies Peter and John?"

data.question: You reach a large Upper Room, fully prepared and fully furnished.
data.answer: "Yo, where do I wash my feet?"

data.question: Choose the one you relate to the most:
data.answer: John; I am the disciple whom Jesus loves

data.question: Choose the one you relate to the most:
data.answer: Peter; I often reply when nobody's asking

data.question: Choose the one you relate to the most:
data.answer: James; I'm always there when Jesus does amazing things

data.question: Choose the one you relate to the most:
data.answer: Thomas; I doubt this quiz is legit

data.question: Everyone has arrived and it's time for the Last Supper.
data.answer: Why is everyone sitting on the same side of the table?

data.question: Everyone has arrived and it's time for the Last Supper.
data.answer: *Looks around to see if everyone has their cutlery and utensils*

data.question: Everyone has arrived and it's time for the Last Supper.
data.answer: Start a conversation... perhaps something about greatness?

data.question: Supper's over and your boy Peter starts spittin claims that he's the greatest. What do you do?
data.answer: Do a rugby tackle and take him down

data.question: Supper's over and your boy Peter starts spittin claims that he's the greatest. What do you do?
data.answer: Wait for Jesus to tell him about the roosters

data.question: Supper's over and your boy Peter starts spittin claims that he's the greatest. What do you do?
data.answer: Root for him, but consider how the others might feel

data.question: Jesus politely interrupts the conversation and talks about true greatness. At this point, you would be:
data.answer: Sitting at His feet to listen to everything He has to say

data.question: Jesus politely interrupts the conversation and talks about true greatness. At this point, you would be:
data.answer: Getting a glass of water in case Jesus gets thirsty

data.question: Jesus politely interrupts the conversation and talks about true greatness. At this point, you would be:
data.answer: Patting Peter on the back, saying "There, there."

data.question: It's time to leave the Upper Room. Before leaving, you...
data.answer: Make sure everything is in its original place for the owner of the house

data.question: It's time to leave the Upper Room. Before leaving, you...
data.answer: Take some selfies with the homies or post an IG reel

data.question: It's time to leave the Upper Room. Before leaving, you...
data.answer: Thank the owner of the house and ask if you can come again in the future
